generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Minecraft Enchantable Misc
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: The enchantable component specifies what enchantments can be applied to the item. Not all enchantments will have an effect on all item components.

fields.title: Slot
fields.description: Specifies which types of enchantments can be applied. For example, `bow` would allow this item to be enchanted as if it were a bow.

fields.title: Value
fields.description: Specifies the value of the enchantment (minimum of 0).
